label: Huerta, Heron & Gustavo R. Spinelli.  2017. A distinctive new species of biting midge in the subgenus Euprojoannisia Brèthes from Mexico with new records of Neotropical species of Forcipomyia Meigen (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 4329(2): 189–195.
